cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the U.S House of Representatives on December 8, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5677, Technical Corrections Legislation

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 186 (Friday, October 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. DEAN:
H.R. 5677.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H5833]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

title: To make technical amendments to update statutory references to certain provisions classified to title 2, United States Code, title 50, United States Code, and title 52, United States Code.
